skills.name: QUELL
desc: • Deals magic damage to a single target.
• Exhaust lowers all offensive and defensive stats on the target by 90%.

skills.name: MYSTERIOUS RAIN
desc: • Deals magic damage to all enemies.
• Grants Cleanse to all allies for 2 turns.
• Grants Immunity to all allies for 2 turns.
• 25% Chance to Refund the Power Cost of this skill.

skills.name: COVER OF NIGHT
desc: Grant Immunity to Mark effects to all allies. Blocks damage for allies below 50% HP and takes random damage equal to 8% of your MAX HP for each hit blocked.
